dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 1105 EH: Debbie Smith Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.official-title: To amend the DNA Analysis Backlog Elimination Act of 2000 to reauthorize the Debbie Smith DNA Backlog Grant Program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Debbie Smith Act of 2023.
Section 2(j) of the DNA Analysis Backlog Elimination Act of 2000 (34 U.S.C. 40701(j)) is amended by striking fiscal years 2019 through 2024 and inserting fiscal years 2024 through 2029.

section.header: Audits to protect integrity of grant awards
section.text: Section 2(c)(4) of the DNA Analysis Backlog Elimination Act of 2000 (34 U.S.C. 40701(c)(4)) is amended by striking 2022 and inserting 2029.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives November 13, 2023.
